title: The Uptown Monotones
text:
The Uptown Monotones are an Austrian experimental/fusion band that formed in Graz in 1993. They became known to a wider audience through the talent show Die gro√üe Chance.


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
2005 The Uptown Monotones (Ginkgo Tree Music)
2013 Criminals (Ginkgo Tree Music)
2014 Fragments In A Frame (Ginkgo Tree Music)


=== EPs/Singles ===
2012 Dust In The Air ft. Jimi D. (Ginkgo Tree Music)
